property.name: onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:render: @{((dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList.size() gt 0) or (dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList.size() gt 0) or (dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms.size() gt 0)) ? true : false}

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
onDocumentReadyScript

bean.p:render: @{dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.savedItemId ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.plannedList.size() eq 0 and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.backupList.size() eq 0 and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms ne null and dataObject.plannedCourseSummary.academicTerms.size() eq 0 ? true : false}

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? true : false}

property.name: render
property.value: @{dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription ne null and dataObject.courseSummaryDetails.courseDescription.length() gt 0 ? false : true}

bean.p:messageText: For more information about the courses outlined below, visit pce.uw.edu.
Enrollment status is updated every few minutes.

property.name: onDocumentReadyScript
title
property.value: @{#line.code} is added. To delete or move, go to @{#line.longTermName} Plan.

bean.p:messageText: May not be eligible for Financial Aid

bean.p:render: @{#line.gradingOption eq null AND !#line.distanceLearning AND !#line.honorsSection AND !#line.jointOffering AND !#line.research AND !#line.writingSection AND !#line.serviceLearning AND !#line.newThisYear AND !#line.ineligibleForFinancialAid AND #line.feeAmount eq null AND !#line.independentStudy}

property.name: title
property.value: @{#line.enrollCount} enrolled out of @{#line.enrollMaximum}@{#line.enrollEstimate eq 'E' ? ' estimated':''} limit.

bean.p:messageText: May not be eligible for Financial Aid

bean.p:render: @{#line.gradingOption eq null AND !#line.distanceLearning AND !#line.honorsSection AND !#line.jointOffering AND !#line.research AND !#line.writingSection AND !#line.serviceLearning AND !#line.newThisYear AND !#line.ineligibleForFinancialAid AND #line.feeAmount eq null AND !#line.independentStudy}
